TopicTitle: The First Six 0.24 Company Logos Revealed!

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/015bea55226813539a3027377039eac3/tumblr_inline_n8077sY8Ln1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>We’ve all waited long enough. It’s finally time to start revealing the <a href="http://bit.ly/TxxGpc"><strong>WINNING LOGOS</strong></a> that will become official and represent the in-game companies as of update <em>0.24</em>. We received a few hundred entries from throughout the community, viewed them all and somehow managed to whittle them down to the few that were ultimately chosen for inclusion in the update. After a bit of a polish, the final logos were ready for placement, starting with <a href="http://bit.ly/TxxGpc"><strong>THESE</strong></a> and continuing throughout the week.</p>
Very nice! I'm amazed, as those logos look very professional and they look like something you would see with a real life company. Great job!

Awww yiiiiis, logos!

I can't wait to see all of them; they seem like they could be real company logos!
These look very nice! Will modders have the ability to create their own and will I be able to change one logo out for my own in 0.24?
Where was this competition and why did I miss it? :< I love making logos :< :<
